context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: look for aid, such as reaching out to social and financial assistance organizations, setting up a crowdfunding page, or consulting with the pharmaceutical company for a patient assistance program
seek financial help from family, friends, or charities
seek financial assistance from charities, non-profit organizations or government programs that help in covering medical costs

explore numerous options including finding cheaper alternatives or generic versions of the drug, reach out to the pharmaceutical company to inquire about patient assistance programs, seek help through fundraising or charitable organizations, speak with her doctor about other treatment options, or try to negotiate the price with the pharmacy
seek financial assistance from friends, family, or community organizations
look for ways to afford the medication
apply for financial aid programs or non-profit organizations that help in covering costs of expensive medications
seek assistance from friends or family
explore various options such as setting up a crowdfunding or fundraising campaign online or in his local community to gather the money
look for financial assistance programs or charities that may be able to help cover the cost of the medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.

call for roadside assistance or a taxi
call for a taxi, Uber or any other ride share services
call a taxi, ride-sharing service, or ask a friend to pick him up and get him to the airport on time
call a taxi, Uber, or some other rideshare service to get a ride to the airport

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: prioritize the group's survival needs: shelter, water, food, and warmth
start rationing the remaining food and water among the group to ensure that everyone has enough to last until help arrives
begin rationing their remaining supplies to ensure longevity
start collecting and purifying snow for drinking water
build a shelter to protect them from the elements using nearby resources like tree branches and leaves
start a fire for warmth and signal for any potential rescue workers
build a shelter from branches, leaves or snow to stay warm and protected from the harsh weather
start finding a way to stay warm and hydrated
create a signal for rescuers to spot them
make a plan to ration out the remaining food and water supplies
